channel.title: Tushar K Maiti on Garbh-Ini

item.description:
Dr. Tushar K Maiti Associate Professor E-mail: tkmaiti at rcb dot res dot in

Postdoc at Nagoya Institute of Technology (Japan), Purdue University (USA), and Weizmann Institute of Science (Israel) PhD 2005, Indian Institute of Technology Associate Professor
